content.name: microwave
content.label: Microwave
content.gloss: an electric oven that heats and cooks food by exposing it to electromagnetic radiation in the microwave frequency range

content.name: body
content.label: Body
content.gloss: the main body part for a microwave, excluding the foot base and cords, etc.

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: base
content.label: Base
content.gloss: the base support for the microwave

content.name: foot_base
content.label: Foot Base
content.gloss: the foot base for microwave that touchs the ground

content.name: surface_base
content.label: Surface Base
content.gloss: surface style base (or directly contacting with the ground)

content.name: accessories
content.label: Accessories
content.gloss: all accessories parts, including cord, etc.

content.name: body_interior
content.label: Body Interior
content.gloss: a set of components inside the microwave box, including the tray and the tray support

content.name: door
content.label: Door
content.gloss: the microwave door which can be open and food can be put through the door

content.name: side_controls
content.label: Side Controls
content.gloss: a set of controls at the side of microwave, including buttons and display panels, etc.

content.name: indicator
content.label: Indicator
content.gloss: indicator of the status on the panel

content.name: cord
content.label: Cord
content.gloss: a cord or connector line that connects the microwave to power

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: a handle that people can use to pull open and off a door

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a short leg or foot at the very bottom of a microwave that touchs the ground

content.name: tray
content.label: Tray
content.gloss: a flat, shallow container with a raised rim, typically used for carrying food and drink, or for holding small items

content.name: tray_support
content.label: Tray Support
content.gloss: a supporting part that is under the microwave interior tray

content.name: door_frame
content.label: Door Frame
content.gloss: the outside frame for the microwave door, usually made of plastic, etc.

content.name: glass
content.label: Door Glass
content.gloss: a glass part on the microwave door that human can see inside the microwave

content.name: door_button
content.label: Door Button
content.gloss: a button that you can push to open the microwave door

content.name: control_button
content.label: Control Button
content.gloss: an individual control button that uses to set the time, mode for microwave

content.name: display_panel
content.label: Display Panel
content.gloss: a display planel on the microwave indicating the cooking time

content.name: frame
content.label: Frame
content.gloss: the exterior microwave box, excluding the interior trays, the outside door and microwave controls, etc.

content.name: surface
content.label: Surface
content.gloss: a big surface board
